issue.title: [CF 1049] Lua errors.
issue.body:
Whenever I log in to the game, or attempt to edit a setting I keep getting a Lua error as follows:

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Attempting to edit any TMW option
2. Sometimes randomly in combat
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
- I expect this not to happen.  This is a very recent occurrence I've never had this happen before.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
- 7.2.2  I saw that some people were able to fix similar issues by installing via the curse client.  I tried that but I'm still getting this bug.

Do you have an error log of what happened?

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)


> Posted by CurseForge user BlueRyd3r | Imported from CurseForge issue #1049 | Raw

comments.body:
You're using a text layout for a bar group on an icon group. Change the text layout on that group to one appropriate for an icon group (like the default icon layout).


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
